Company Overview

TORRENT ELECTRICALS PRIVATE LIMITED is a 4.10 Years old company, incorporated on 23 Oct 2019. It is classified as Private UnListed Indian Non-Government Company. Its authorized share capital is ₹1,27,00,00,000.00 ( ₹127.00 Cr ) and its paid up capital is ₹84,00,00,000.00 ( ₹84.00 Cr ). As per MCA the main line of business is Manufacture Of Electrical Machinery And Apparatus N.E.C..

TORRENT ELECTRICALS PRIVATE LIMITED's Annual General Meeting (AGM) was last held on 25 Jul 2024 and as per records from Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), its balance sheet was last filed on 31 Mar 2024.

TORRENT ELECTRICALS PRIVATE LIMITED's unique Corporate Identification Number (CIN) is U31904GJ2019PTC110468 and its registration number is 110468. It is registered at RoC-Ahmedabad.

The company is incorporated with the address TORRENT POWER LTD - CABLES UNIT YOGINAGAR MISSION ROAD NA; NADIAD; Kheda; Gujarat; 387002; India.

The current status of the company is Active.
